You're right, it's not. Hopefully it's unique and practical enough to avoid
being pointless! The main drivers were simplicity and encouraging
applications to be expressed in terms of link relations.

Cheers,
Mike

On Wed, Jun 15, 2011 at 7:00 PM, Mark Baker <distobj@...> wrote:

> Interesting. Looks a lot like Atom, RDF, and even HTML if you squint a
> bit.  I don't think that's a coincidence.
>
> Mark.
>

--000e0cd1478647267604a5c4faf3
